post_title: WTB Chase White Cap nice looking in SGC 3-4.5 holder
post_content:
Hey all,
I’d like to buy a White Cap Hal Chase in an SGC holder (preferably) so I can finally get the five poses displayed! I might have some trading stock if you are looking for one of the other poses.

Let me know if you have a nice one, pretty well centered, since I’ll be looking at it on the wall. A fun back would be a bonus, but not required as I’d just love to finally get these on the wall!

Thanks,
Bob
 Current lineup:

Hi! I've developed this frame that works great for a 5-card run... mix and match of slab types and/or raw... let me know if interested!
I'll message/email also..
Thanks,
Craig Martin
[url]C.martin@spirearch.com[/url]
